document.docAuthor: Alves, Maria De Lourdes, Ramos-Porto, Marilena & Viana, Girlene Fábia Segundo
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Decapods (Crustacea) from the Fernando de Noronha Archipelago, Brazil

Examined material: AUG/ 92 : Praia do Porto,
9 males
,
1 female
(ovigerous). NOV/ 92 : Praia do Porto,
1 male
. JAN/ 93 : Baía do Sueste,
3 males
,
1 female

4 females
(ovigerous). JUL/ 93 : Baía do Sueste,
4 males
,
1 female
. JAN/ 2000 : Praia da Caieira:
1 specimen
.
Habitat: in the sublittoral (in the interior of blocks of rocks), and on rocks in bottom sandy-muddy; generally in pairs.
Observation: greenish coloration.
Diagnosis: Coutière, 1898 b: 149 , fig. 1 - 1 a.

Previous records: Chace Jr., 1972 : 63 ;
Christoffersen, 1998
: 357 . Examined material: Praia da Caieira,
3 males
,
1 female
. Habitat: in pools, under rocky blocks.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Diagnosis:
Schmitt, 1936
: 366 , pl. 12 , figs. 2 a-g (as
Jousseaumea arubae Schmitti, 1936
).
Previous records: none.

Examined material: NOV/ 92 : Praia da Caieira,
1 male
. AUG/ 93 : Baía do Sueste,
1 male
,
1 female
(ovigerous).
Habitat: in the interior of blocks encrusted with soft seaweed; under rocks; in bottom sandy-muddy; depth of up to 4 meters; always in pairs.
Observations: yellow coloration.
